metadata.name: Loading Penguin Hugs
metadata.description: Loading Penguin Hugs combines adorable illustrations with wholesome messages to cheer you on. Expressions like "You are not a failure. You are still growing!" provide encouragement and promote healthy mindsets. Chen's chubby penguins, hedgehogs, Chibirds, and friends of all shapes put a smile on anyone's face, and they've already made millions smile on Instagram, Tumblr, and GIPHY. Loading Penguin Hugs is full of brand-new Chibird comics alongside popular favorites. This inspiring book is perfect for new and old Chibird fans. Chen and her animal friends are ready to brighten anyone's day, one comic at a time.
